short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save tweets from purged Twitter accounts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tweet Saver saves tweets from the "Twitter Account Purge" taking effect before 2020. 

Save tweets from inactive accounts to Facebook. Unlike Twitter and many other services, Facebook does not delete your content if you follow the rules.

See: https://www.theverge.com/2019/11/26/20984328/twitter-removing-inactive-accounts-usernames-available-date
